name: STELLAR PRICE
description:
Stellar price is an adventure game focused on space where the economy plays an important role. Get resources and don't let them damage your ship. otherwise the costs will come out of your pocket.

The game was supposed to have 3 different endings, but in the current version in the JAM only one can be available due the bugs. After the JAM I will launch a supported version of the game to add the endings and fix isues.
